jobmetadata.auth: A320-214机型航线维护（限制项目）

miscontent.title: 货舱衬板 整体目视检查货舱释压,衬板和地板以及压力补偿阀 （目视的最远距离，如果安装了ACT） CARGO COMPARTMENTS GENERAL VISUAL INSPECTION OF CARGO COMPARTMENT DECOMPRESSION, LINING AND FLOOR PANELS AND PRESSURE COMPENSATION VALVE (AS FAR AS VISIBLE, IF ACT(S) INSTALLED)

row.entry: 风速超过40 KNOTS时不能打开货舱门，否则会造成货舱门结构损伤。
开关舱门前，应确保舱门行程范围内无障碍物，避免造成人员或舱门结构损伤。
风速超过65 KNOTS时应及时关闭货舱门，否则会造成货舱门结构损伤。

task.chgdesc: GRAPHIC REFERENCE ADDED, REVISED, OR DELETED
task.title: Visual Check of Cargo Compartment Decompression, Lining, Floor Panels and Pressure Compensation Valve (as far as visible, if ACT(s) installed)
task.title-zh: 货舱衬板-整体目视检查货舱释压,衬板和地板以及压力补偿阀（目视的最远距离，如果安装了ACT）

caution.para: BE CAREFUL WHEN YOU INSPECT THE SEALING OF THE CARGO COMPARTMENT LININGS, SIDEWALL PANELS, CEILING PANELS, BALL MATS, PARTITION WALLS, FLOOR PANELS AND COVER PLATES.
MAKE SURE THAT THE CARGO COMPARTMENTS ARE CORRECTLY SEALED. PRESSURE LEAKS THROUGH THE CARGO COMPARTMENT CAN CAUSE A DECREASE IN THE PERFORMANCE OF THE FIRE EXTINGUISHING SYSTEM, IF A FIRE OCCURS.

caution-zh.para: 当检查货舱衬板，侧板，天花板，隔板，地板和盖板的封严时，需要小心。
确保货舱密封完好，如果在货舱中发生压力渗漏，火警发生时会导致灭火系统的功能变差。

description.para: Torque wrench: range to between 0.055 and 0.060 m.daN (4.87 and 5.31 lbf.in)
力矩扳手：力矩范围从0.055到0.060 m.daN (4.87 到5.31 lbf.in)

BULK CARGO COMPARTMENT AFT BULKHEAD OF AFT CARGO COMPARTMENT TO AFT BULKHEAD OF BULK CARGO COMPARTMENT

mech.authname: A320-214机型航线维护（限制项目）

l2item.para:
Open the forward and/or aft cargo-compartment doors 52-30-00-860-001
52-30-00-860-001-A
.
Put the ACCESS PLATFORM 2M (6 FT) in position at the opening of the forward and/or aft cargo-compartment door(s).
放 2米工作梯置于前和后货舱门旁边。
Set the light switch to the 'ON' position.

subtask.chgdesc: GRAPHIC REFERENCE ADDED, REVISED, OR DELETED

mech.authname: A320-214机型航线维护（限制项目）

l1item.para: Visual Inspection of the Decompression, Lining, Floor Panels and Pressure Compensation Valve
目视检查释压板、衬板、地板和压力补偿活门。

warning.para: USE GOGGLES AND PROTECTIVE CLOTHING WHEN YOU REMOVE, INSTALL OR TORQUE THE FASTENER.
IF PARTS OF THE FASTENER RELEASE SUDDENLY, THERE IS A RISK OF INJURY.

warning-zh.para: 安装或者拧紧固件时戴护目镜和防护服。
如果紧固件零件突然松开，有可能造成伤害。

caution.para: ONCE THE RELEASE FUNCTION OF THE BRACKET (SPRING-LOADED CATCH) HAS BEEN OPENED, THE ASSEMBLY ABS1847 MUST BE REPLACED. DO NOT MIX OLD FASTENER TYPE ABS 0336-xx WITH NEW FUNCTIONAL TYPE ABS 1847-xx.

caution-zh.para: 一旦支架释放功能打开，组件ABS 1847必须被更换。不要将旧紧固件ABS 0336–XX类型和新功能ABS 1847–XX类型混掉。

l3item.para: Examine each decompression panel for cracks and other damage.
检查每块释压板是否有裂纹和其他破损情况。
Make sure that each decompression panel has a seal installed, missing seals are not permitted.
确保每块释压板都安装有封严，封严缺失是不允许的。
Make sure that the seal of each decompression panel is in the correct condition.
确保每块释压板的封严状态良好。
Make sure that each decompression panel is in the correct position.
确保每块释压板位置正确。

mech.authname: A320-214机型航线维护（限制项目）

l3item.para: Examine each lining panel for cracks and other damage.
检查每块衬板是否有裂纹和其他损坏

If a lining panel is damaged, refer to 25-50-00-200-024
25-50-00-200-024-A
.
Make sure that each lining panel has a seal installed, missing seals are not permitted.
确保每块衬板都安装有封严，缺失封严是不允许的。
Make sure that the seal of each lining panel are in the correct condition.
确保每块封严状态良好。
Make sure that each lining panel is in the correct position.
确保每块衬板位置正确。
Make sure that the linings panels are correctly attached:
确保所有衬板安装正确。

l4item.para: Tighten the loose fasteners to the correct torque value:
将松脱的紧固件磅至正确的力矩值，按需填写附表1：
If necessary, replace the fasteners.
按需更换紧固件。
Missing fasteners are permitted for the ceiling, sidewall and partition lining panels if:
顶板，侧板和隔板上的紧固件允许缺失，前提是：

unlitem.para: There are no fasteners (1) missing at the corners of the lining panels.
衬板角上无紧固件（1）缺失。
Not more than one fastener (2) is missing from an edge of the lining panel.
衬板的每条边上不超过一个紧固件（2）缺失。

l4item.para: Install the fastener if it is missing:
如果紧固件缺失，安装紧固件：

mech.authname: A320-214机型航线维护（限制项目）

l3item.para: Examine each floor panel for:
检查每块地板：

note.para: The strips of different colours are not considered as a damage of the floor panel. The bright points of the panel edge are not considered as a damage of the floor panel.

note-zh.para: 地板不同程度的褪色不被认为是一种损伤。边缘亮点不被认为是地板损伤。

l3item.para: Make sure that the floor panels are correctly installed.
确保地板安装正确。
Examine the section hoses (if installed):
检查分隔橡胶软管（如果安装了）

l4item.para: Make sure that the section hoses are correctly installed.
确保分隔橡胶软管正确安装。

If the section hoses come out of the space between floor panels, install them correctly 53-42-14-400-001
53-42-14-400-001-A
.

l3item.para: Make sure that the sealant at the floor panel joints is in the correct condition.
确保地板之间的密封胶处于良好状态。

If the sealant is damaged, repair it 51-76-11-300-001
51-76-11-300-001-A
.

mech.authname: A320-214机型航线维护（限制项目）

l3item.para: Make sure that each pressure compensation valve (4) is in closed position.
确保每个压力补偿活门（4）都处于关闭状态。
If a pressure compensation valve (4) is in open position, close it:
如果压力补偿活门（4）处于打开状态，参考如下步骤关闭：

l4item.para:
Remove the partition panel (5) to get access to the pressure compensation valve (4) 25-54-12-000-001
25-54-12-000-001-A
or 25-55-12-000-001
25-55-12-000-001-A
.
Hold the pressure compensation valve (4).
托住压力补偿活门（4）。
Loosen the studs (2) and remove the cover (3).
松开螺栓（2），拆除保护罩（3）。
Push the pin (1) in the closed position.
推动销子（1）至闭合位置。
Put the cover (3) in its correct installation position.
将保护罩（3）放置在正确的安装位置。

TORQUE the studs (2)
.

mech.authname: A320-214机型航线维护（限制项目）

note.para: When you tighten the studs you will hear a click. This is a sign that you have used the correct procedure to tighten the studs. This click is not a sign that the correct torque value is applied. When the studs are tightened, make sure that the correct torque value is applied.

note-zh.para: 当拧紧螺栓时会听到咔哒声，这表明使用了正确的程序拧紧螺栓。这里的咔哒声不是代表拧紧到正确的力矩值的声音，当螺栓拧紧时确保使用了正确的力矩值。

mech.authname: A320-214机型航线维护（限制项目）
A320-214机型航线维护（限制项目）

l2item.para: Make sure that the work area is clean and clear of tools and other items.
确保工作区域清洁，无遗漏工具和其他设备。
Set the light switch to the 'OFF' position.

Close the forward and/or aft cargo-compartment doors 52-30-00-860-002
52-30-00-860-002-A
.
